name: Russian Train Trip 3
description:
You are a passenger on a train leaving from Tyumen to Novosibirsk. Your goal is to get to the end point.

The game consists of several stages with a full-fledged interesting plot.

You can look out the window and watch the changing nature, weather and architecture, listen to the radio and watch TV. You can see forests, fields, mountains, cities and villages.

The game offers you a fascinating journey across Russia by train, full of adventures, discoveries and emotions.
